snippet: Putting a wealthy donor’s name on a museum can discourage giving, experts say, but it might also open new doors to different donors.
abstract: Some experts say museums that bear a wealthy donor’s name may discourage other people from giving money, but others argue that high-profile names could generate more publicity--and more potential donors--for the institutions.
lead_paragraph: Putting a wealthy donor’s name on a museum can discourage giving, experts say, but it might also open new doors to different donors.

headline.main: Who Wants to Donate to a Billionaire’s Museum?
headline.print_headline: Who Wants to Donate to a Billionaire’s Museum?
